title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.1 - Advertising and signs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.1 - Advertising and signs

State Regulations
(a) Advertising by
any means whatever and the display of any type of sign within the parkway
system is prohibited except as authorized by the department. (b) Section 13.07 of the Parks and Recreation

Law is applicable to any sign and/or advertising structure and device adjacent
to the boundaries of the parkway system right-of-way. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
